name: Save System & Persistence

subtasks.name: SaveDataSchema.js
subtasks.description: Define complete save data structure covering ALL game systems
subtasks.workerNotes: Created SaveDataSchema.js with complete save structure covering: player (position, rotation, stats, XP, level, allocated points, abilities), inventory (items, equipment, hotbar), quests (active with progress, completed, reputation), world state (time, weather, day count, locations), crafting (recipes, cooldowns), combat (kill counts), metadata (slot, timestamp, playtime, level, location), version for migrations

subtasks.name: SaveManager.js
subtasks.description: 3 manual save slots + 1 autosave, LZString compression, localStorage, import/export
subtasks.workerNotes: Created SaveManager.js with: (1) 3 manual slots + autosave slot, (2) LZString compression for storage, (3) save/load/delete/getSaveInfo/listSaves methods, (4) Autosave triggers every 5 min, (5) Import/export as downloadable JSON, (6) Delta compression for world state, (7) Corrupt save recovery with version migration support

subtasks.name: SaveIntegration.js
subtasks.description: Hook autosave triggers, menus, UI indicators, combat/cutscene blocking
subtasks.workerNotes: Created SaveIntegration.js with: (1) Autosave triggers on village entry, quest complete, 5-min timer, (2) Main menu with Continue/New Game/Load Game, (3) Death screen Load Last Save option, (4) Pause menu Save/Load/Main Menu, (5) Non-blocking 'Saving...' indicator, (6) Combat/cutscene save blocking, (7) First-save tutorial prompt, (8) Cloud save placeholder structure

subtasks.name: SaveUI.js
subtasks.description: Enhanced save/load UI with thumbnails, better visuals, export/import polish
subtasks.workerNotes: Created SaveUI.js with: (1) Canvas screenshot capture for thumbnails, (2) Enhanced slot rendering with thumbnails, level, location, playtime, timestamp, (3) Autosave badge, (4) Toast notifications, (5) Fade transitions, (6) Statistics panel, (7) Keyboard navigation, (8) Audio hooks

subtasks.name: StateRestoration.js
subtasks.description: Implement state restoration across all managers with proper init order
subtasks.workerNotes: Created StateRestoration.js with: (1) RESTORATION_ORDER array defining proper init sequence, (2) Individual restore methods for each system with proper type conversion, (3) Pre-load validation, (4) Post-load validation for orphaned quests and invalid items, (5) onGameLoaded/onValidationComplete events, (6) refreshAllUI() after load, (7) Integrated with SaveManager.load()

subtasks.name: SavePolish
subtasks.description: Screenshots, playtime tracking, statistics, sound effects, transitions
subtasks.workerNotes: Completed save polish: (1) Canvas screenshots, (2) Playtime tracking, (3) Statistics panel with 12 tracked stats, (4) Sound effect hooks, (5) Fade transitions, (6) Last-played sorting, (7) Full keyboard navigation
